_metadata._comment: ui-global-config.json ‚Äî Animations, welcome screen, setup wizard, account screen, locations, household, vehicles, and user preferences screen.
_metadata._comment_2: Namespaces: ui.*, animation.*, welcome.*, setup_wizard.*, account.*, location.*, household.*, vehicle.*, preferences.*

animation._comment: Master animation controls. Detailed timing and curves are in theme-config.json.
animation._comment_enabled: Global on/off for ALL animations. Set false for accessibility or low-end devices.
animation._comment_system: If device 'Reduce Motion' accessibility setting is on, disable animations automatically.
animation._comment_task: Strike-through and slide-to-bottom animation when task is checked.
animation._comment_schedule: Celebration animation when a task is saved on schedule screen.
animation._comment_points: Points bubble animation when points are earned.
animation._comment_list: List items animate in when a screen loads.

effects._comment_wizard_effect: Animation shown when user completes setup wizard.

welcome._comment: Welcome screen content and navigation flow.
welcome._comment_theme: Show 5 theme preview cards so user personalises the app before anything else.
welcome._comment_lang_position: Language selector top-right so non-English speakers can switch before reading anything.
welcome._comment_permission: Request OS notification permission on welcome screen with explanation of importance.

flow._comment_flow: Get Started ‚Üí Setup Wizard ‚Üí (Dashboard if tasks exist) or (Category Screen if no tasks).
flow._comment_returning: If returning user signs in on welcome screen, skip setup wizard ‚Üí go to dashboard.

setup_wizard._comment: Setup wizard global settings. Question content, sequence, and answers are in setup-config.json.
setup_wizard._comment_skip: Every question is optional. User can skip any or all questions.
setup_wizard._comment_persist: Each time user taps Next, selected answers are saved to Isar under user_preferences immediately.
setup_wizard._comment_flag: Stored in user_preferences. If true, setup wizard is never shown again on launch.
setup_wizard._comment_re_access: User can re-run setup wizard from Account ‚Üí Preferences to update their answers.
setup_wizard._comment_source: All question text, explanation, answer options, and sequence loaded from setup-config.json.

account._comment: Account screen section definitions and visibility rules.

user_identity._comment_guest: Label shown when user is not registered.

subscription._comment_cta: CTA shown only if user is not premium.
subscription._comment_expiry: Show expiry warning badge this many days before subscription ends.

danger_zone._comment_gdpr: Delete account fulfils GDPR Article 17 right to erasure. Two confirmation steps prevent accidents.

location._comment: Default location options for setup wizard Q3 and user preferences screen.
location._comment_2: Values are i18n keys ‚Äî never raw strings.
location._comment_custom: User can type and add custom locations not in the default list.
location._comment_sync: Custom locations pushed to backend for product team review ‚Äî improves defaults for all users.
location._comment_stub: Backend not yet built. Use empty stub method. Will be wired up when backend is ready.
location._comment_intersection: On schedule screen, only show locations present in BOTH task config AND user's home setup.

household._comment: Household age group options. Used in setup wizard Q2.
household._comment_2: In future releases, age groups filter which task categories and tasks are visible.
household._comment_multi: User can select multiple age groups ‚Äî households often have mixed ages.

age_groups._comment: Unlocks baby/toddler task categories in future.
School-age children. Unlocks school-related task categories.
Seniors. May unlock health and medication task categories.

household._comment_reserved: assigned_to and group_id reserved for future social task sharing. Nullable. Ignored by app today.

vehicle._comment: Vehicle types captured in setup wizard Q5.
vehicle._comment_reg: DVLA API lookup applies to cars and motorbikes only. Cycles have no reg plate.
vehicle._comment_max: How many vehicles of each type a user can register.
vehicle._comment_cycle: Cycles get a periodic service reminder at this interval. No DVLA lookup needed.
vehicle._comment_dvla: As soon as user enters a reg plate and taps next, DVLA lookup is triggered.
vehicle._comment_confirm: API result shown on Smart Task Confirmation screen before tasks are created.

preferences._comment: User preferences screen sections. Add new sections here as features grow.
preferences._comment_extensible: New sections added here appear on preferences screen automatically.
preferences._comment_reminders: Options shown in preferred reminders section. User selects their global defaults.
preferences._comment_notifications: Each sub-section has an on/off toggle. Preferences stored in user_preferences Isar collection.
